Sophia

Height:

KATSEYE

Introduction

Sophia Elizabeth G. Laforteza is a Filipino singer and dancer under Geffen Records and HYBE Labels. She is best known as the leader of the global girl group KATSEYE.

Sophia is recognized for her participation in the survival show "The Debut: Dream Academy", where she ranked 1st and qualified for debut, becoming a member of the girl group KATSEYE.

On August 16, 2024, Sophia officially debuted as a member of KATSEYE with their first EP "SIS (SOFT IS STRONG)".
